info.title: HiveCache API
info.description: Decentralized social bookmarking service based on the Activity Pub protocol.

post.description: Authenticates a user with username and password, returns a JWT token for subsequent API requests.

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of public bookmarks from this instance. Supports cursor-based pagination. Default page size is 24 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - bookmark ID to fetch results after

200.description: List of public bookmarks from this instance

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

instance_bookmarks.summary: Paginated list of bookmarks from this instance

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of public bookmarks from other instances (federated bookmarks). Supports cursor-based pagination. Default page size is 24 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - bookmark ID to fetch results after

200.description: List of public bookmarks from other instances

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

federated_bookmarks.summary: Paginated list of bookmarks from other instances

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of bookmarks owned by the authenticated user. Supports filtering by tags and cursor-based pagination. Default page size is 24 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tag slugs to filter by

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - bookmark ID to fetch results after

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

post.description: Creates a new bookmark. If a bookmark with the same URL already exists, the previous one will be marked as outdated.

422.description: Validation error - invalid data or invalid tag IRIs

tags_as_objects.summary: Tags provided as JSON objects instead of IRIs

error.message: Tags must be IRIs, not objects

get.description: Returns a specific bookmark owned by the authenticated user.

404.description: Bookmark not found or not owned by user

delete.description: Permanently deletes a bookmark (and all its versions/history) owned by the authenticated user.

404.description: Bookmark not found or not owned by user

patch.description: Updates an existing bookmark. URL cannot be changed after creation (URL field in request body is ignored). Tags are preserved if not included in the request body.

404.description: Bookmark not found or not owned by user

get.description: Returns the history of outdated bookmarks with the same normalized URL as the given bookmark. The current bookmark is not included in the history. Results are ordered by creation date (newest first).

404.description: Bookmark not found or not owned by user

get.summary: List own bookmarks for client side indexing
get.description: Returns a paginated collection of bookmarks owned by the authenticated user. Default page size is 100 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - bookmark ID to fetch results after

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

get.description: Returns a collection of bookmark index actions (changes) for the authenticated user. Used for syncing client-side index with server changes. Results are ordered by ID (ascending).

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - index action ID to fetch results after

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of public bookmarks from the social timeline. The timeline includes bookmarks from users you follow and public bookmarks from your instance. Supports cursor-based pagination. Default page size is 24 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - bookmark ID to fetch results after

200.description: List of public bookmarks from timeline

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of public bookmarks filtered by an instance tag. Instance tags are tags that are used across multiple users on the instance. Supports cursor-based pagination. Default page size is 24 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - bookmark ID to fetch results after

200.description: List of public bookmarks with the specified tag

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

tagged_bookmarks.summary: Paginated list of bookmarks with tag

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile information including username, isPublic status, and meta data.

delete.description: Permanently deletes the authenticated user's account and all associated data. After deletion, accessing GET /users/me will return 404.

patch.description: Updates the authenticated user's profile. Username and password changes will invalidate existing JWT tokens. Meta data is merged, not replaced.

meta.description: Additional metadata as key-value pairs (merged with existing)

get.description: This endpoint is not supported. Use POST to upload files.

405.description: Method not allowed - use POST to upload files

post.description: Uploads a file and returns a FileObject that can be referenced in bookmarks (mainImage, archive).

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of accounts that follow the authenticated user. Default page size is 100 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - account ID to fetch results after

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of accounts that the authenticated user is following. Default page size is 100 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - account ID to fetch results after

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

post.description: Creates a follow relationship with the specified account by username.

parameters.name: usernameWithInstance
parameters.description: Username of the account to follow (with instance)

delete.description: Removes the follow relationship with the specified account by username (with instance).

parameters.name: usernameWithInstance
parameters.description: Username of the account to unfollow

get.description: Returns a collection of all tags owned by the authenticated user, including both public and private tags.

post.description: Creates a new tag or returns an existing tag if a tag with the same name already exists. Maximum 1000 tags per user. Slug is automatically generated from the name and cannot be forced (slug field in request body is ignored).

200.description: Tag created or existing tag returned

422.description: Validation error - maximum 1000 tags reached or invalid data

error.message: You have reached the 1000 tags limit.

get.description: Returns a specific tag owned by the authenticated user.

404.description: Tag not found or not owned by user

delete.description: Permanently deletes a tag owned by the authenticated user.

404.description: Tag not found or not owned by user

patch.description: Updates an existing tag. Meta data is merged, not replaced. Changing the name will update the slug.

404.description: Tag not found or not owned by user

409.description: Conflict - tag with new name already exists

get.summary: List public bookmarks of a user
get.description: Returns a paginated collection of public bookmarks owned by the specified user. Supports filtering by tags (only public tags) and cursor-based pagination. Default page size is 24 items, ordered by creation date (newest first).

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tag slugs to filter by (only public tags)

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination - bookmark ID to fetch results after

nextPage.description: URL for next page if available

get.description: Returns a specific public bookmark owned by the specified user.

200.description: Bookmark details. Returns JSON by default (Accept: application/json) or HTML redirect (Accept: text/html).

404.description: Bookmark not found, not public, or user not found

get.description: Returns the public profile information of a user. Only works if the user has set their profile as public.

200.description: Public user profile. Returns JSON by default (Accept: application/json) or HTML redirect (Accept: text/html).

404.description: User not found or profile is not public

get.summary: List public tags of a user
get.description: Returns a collection of public tags owned by the specified user.
Returns a specific public tag owned by the specified user.

200.description: Public tag details. Returns JSON by default (Accept: application/json) or HTML redirect (Accept: text/html).

404.description: Tag not found, not public, or user not found

post.description: Creates a new user with username and password. Returns the created user object and associated account.

422.description: Validation error - username already exists or invalid data

error.message: Username must be between 3 and 32 characters

403.description: Forbidden - instance does not allow new accounts

409.description: Conflict - username already exist with a different set of case

tags.description: Array of tag IRIs (must be valid IRIs pointing to existing tags owned by the user)
Array of tag IRIs. If omitted, existing tags are preserved.

name.description: Tag name (slug is auto-generated from name)

meta.description: Additional metadata as key-value pairs (merged with existing)

AccountShowPublic.description: Account object representing an ActivityPub account

instance.description: Instance domain where the account is hosted
Instance host where the bookmark was created
Instance host where the bookmark was created

BookmarkIndexAction.description: Bookmark index action representing a change to a bookmark

type.description: Type of action performed on the bookmark

bookmark.description: The bookmark id associated with this action

FileObject.description: File object representing an uploaded file

contentUrl.description: URL to access the file content

@iri.description: IRI of the file object resource

FollowerShowPublic.description: Follower object representing an account that follows the user

createdAt.description: When the follow relationship was created

FollowingShowPublic.description: Following object representing an account that the user follows

createdAt.description: When the follow relationship was created

bearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from POST /auth endpoint
